attributes.comment:
We have adopted one child in 2004, we have been trying to bring another child
home from Guatemala for 4 1/2 years. We plan to adopt another while waiting out
the second childs adoption. We have to keep our I600A current, our fingerprints,
and then need to file for Certificate of Citizenships. Along with all the fees in
adopting a child then to raise The 1600, fingerprinting, CoC,is a major jump and
burden on adopting parents. Please dont raise the fees. Most parents are
struggling to adopt but want to love more children. Please dont raise the fees.

Sincerely,
Audra Rice

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
